search.title: Search

trial_over.heading: Your Free Trial has expired
trial_over.text:
Hi, {{ name }}. It looks like your 14-Day Enterprise Plan free trial already ended. That means all your Add-Ons are now disabled.

But you probably don't want to lose the conversion and revenue bump you got from your Add-Ons, right?

Choose a plan that best fits your goals and continue to enjoy higher conversion rates.

addons_limit_reached.heading: Woah! Easy There, Tiger!
addons_limit_reached.text:
Seems like you need more Add-Ons :)

Your current plan [plan_name] activates up to [current_limit] Add-ons only. [upgraded_plan] allows you to activate [upgraded_limit] Add-ons. Upgrade your plan to unlock ALL Premium Features.
addons_limit_reached.note: *Note: If more than [current_limit] Add-ons are selected, only the first [current_limit] Add-ons ticked are activated. How do I disable excess Add-Ons?
